divs: Sighting DetailsChucky Cheese Rest. off 57fwy in Brea. 3 men in parking lot witnessed a fireball at low altitude for about 5 seconds. They lost sight as it heading toward Diamond Bar. Did not hear a noise from it and it left no smoke trail.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brea
There were no other sightings in Brea on or around January 18th 2009
Summary: Small fireball at low altitude with 3 witnesses.
